comments.body: Whether the flyway database migrations will run on a non-empty database without a flyway version history. Normally the indexer should abort if it detects a database schema that was not created by the same flyway version history, to prevent modifying the wrong database.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@  */
final case class ParticipantIndexerConfig(
    allowExistingSchema: Boolean,
    databaseConnectionPoolSize: Int = ParticipantIndexerConfig.DefaultDatabaseConnectionPoolSize,
    inputMappingParallelism: Int = ParticipantIndexerConfig.DefaultInputMappingParallelism,
